humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient has no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes (pN0(0/13)LOVORO), meaning that all 13 assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Based on New Rule 11 and Rule 2, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pN0(0/13)LOVORO' notation in the report indicates that there were no cancerous lymph nodes found in the 13 nodes that were examined (0/13). This corresponds to an N0 stage, which means no regional lymph node metastasis. The 'LOVORO' part of the notation is a suffix used by the specific pathologist or institution and does not affect the N stage.
